programme.title: 我家是联合国 Home of United Nations - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Pei Qi grew up in a well-to-do family. As a result of a turn of events, her parents decided to offer their services as student caretakers, and converted their bungalow into a "student hostel" for international kids. From then on, children from all over the world started to move in. These kids from different countries were initially resistant and dismissive of one another. As Pei Qi witnesses their loneliness and yearning for home, she puts herself in their shoes and finally realizes how fortunate she is. Pei Qi starts to reach out and make friends with them. Through mutual support and learning, they built a sincere friendship that transcends geographical boundaries. (重)一个从小生活在富有家庭的小千金佩娸, 因为父親生意失敗,不得以將原本宽裕的洋房改为〞学生宿舍〝. 从此面对来自中囯,韓囯,印尼,俄罗斯和印度等不同国家的学生… 这一群不同囯藉的小朋友,一开始就亙相抗拒,歧视和排彻,更甚至結党紛爭,直到有一次佩娸见识到他们思家的心情,离鄉的孤独,才身感其受,领悟到自己是多么的活在福中不知福,从那一刻起佩娸主动的伸出友誼之手,大家坦开心房,透过彼此的关心,扶持和学习,建立起不分囯界的真挚友情….

Meiqi regains consciousness and Ansheng expresses immense gratitude towards the doctor, Zicheng. Zicheng mentions to Ansheng that they were once alumni back in London. programme.title: 甘榜情 Kampong Ties - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) The story begins in a kampong in the 1960s. Yueman is ostracised by her father in-law, Weng Tianshi, for giving birth to a mute daughter while her husband Jiaqing is a good-for-nothing bum. The only son in the Wang family, Wang Lihai, has contracted a venereal disease and his mother hurriedly finds a match-maker to get him a wife. Shuixian is thus arranged to marry him. On the day of the wedding, their marriage ceremony is interrupted by news of Yueman and her daughter being poisoned. (重)60年代某甘榜，月满因生下哑巴女儿安安而被家翁天狮仇视，丈夫家青借此好吃懒做。王家独生子王立海患上性病，母亲头家娘找金牙婆做媒，安排水仙嫁给立海。结婚当日，住在隔壁的月满母女却中毒入院，喜事撞上衰事！.

programme.title: 甘榜情 Kampong Ties - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Shuixian and Yueman become good friends. Shuixian advises Yueman to be optimistic but Yueman maintains she didn't commit suicide on that day and she says no one will take care of her son Weinan if she dies. Shuixian concludes Nine-Headed-Bird is the one who is spreading the rumours and is turned off by him. (PG)(重)水仙和月满成为莫逆之交，水仙劝月满要看开一点，月满说她那天并不是要自杀，而是吃错东西，而且儿子伟南还这么小，自己死了谁会照顾他？所以她是不会自杀的。水仙知道九头鸟又再胡乱造谣，对他十分反感。.

He assists Miss Ng in organizing the recycling program. During the outing, Xiao Shu meets a crazy beggar and he is going to hurt Xiao Shu. Zhi Shu tries to rescue him. 再次回到2020年的直树恢复了所有记忆。为让小树有美好的未来，直树决定重新做人。直树希望能重新当个好老师，于是主动协助黄老师办环保郊游。小树在郊游时，遇上了疯乞丐。疯乞丐企图伤害小树。直树见状，飞身扑救….

programme.title: 春花望露 Spring Flower - EP 408

programme.title: 《我.董.你 》2: Spark The Next Be My Guest 2: Spark The Next - EP 2
programme.desc: Dedric Wong is the assistant conductor and a founding member of Chinese chamber music ensemble Ding Yi Music Company. He also explains his resolve to pursue music professionally, recounts his parents' disapproval, and shares his regrets thus far. Now, he hopes to make music accessible and enjoyable to the masses. 黄德励是全职华乐室内乐团《鼎艺团》的助理指挥和创团成员之一。他曾是唢呐冠军，主持人董素华也在节目中向他拜师学艺。在本地全职搞音乐的人不多，往华乐发展的更少，为什么德励选择这么做？他当年如何说服父母让他从理工学院退学，追求梦想？德励的理想是把华乐带入民间，包括和弱势群体合作。回首过去，他有哪些遗憾？.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 世界第一等 World's No. 1 - EP 4
programme.desc: The adventure style travelogue programme goes around the world in search of the unique cultures and practices. Some can be quite mouth-dropping and intriguing. 要说到古代进贡给皇帝，延年益寿、长命百岁的补品，大多都是罕见的稀世珍宝。而这次咱们来到印尼皇室所在的爪哇岛，从古自今更是流传了不少，专门提供给皇室成员的食补圣品，只是现在则成了一般平民百姓，都有机会吃到的特殊料理。既然如此，我们当然也要让大家有机会过过王宫贵族的瘾，看看印尼皇家大补帖里，吃的都是些什么好料。.

programme.title: 城市觅食 City Foragers - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Where could wild fruits be found in the concrete jungle of Singapore? Come to Pulau Ubin! With its relatively untouched natural vegetation, it's not difficult to find wild fruits and vegetables that our forefathers used to enjoy in kampong villages. Also, have you thought of growing fruits in the corridors of public housing? Is it feasible? (重)新加坡是个钢骨水泥的森林，要到哪儿才能找到野瓜野果呢？当然是乌敏岛！据说，乌敏岛是个"超级果园"，在哪里可以找到什么野生瓜果呢？ 另外，你想不想在组屋门前的走廊栽种果树呢？那就不要错过这一集的《城市觅食》。.

programme.title: 我的小小美猴王 My Little Monkey King - EP 28

programme.title: 小小传奇 Gonna Make It - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Ah Man agrees to take Xiaoxiao as his apprentice, under the condition that she does not reveal their teacher-student relationship. (PG)(重)阿满答应收小小为徒，条件是不能透露两人师徒的关系，还要小小在两个月内通过他的考验，才正式公开授徒。小小一口答应。有红星前来发廊给阿满做头发，阿满安排小小当助手，小小目睹阿满的手艺，敬佩不已。.

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Minfei is woken up by Guo En's call and only realised that Guo En wants her to be a volunteer doctor upon reaching the community club. Both argue over differences in medical opinions. Zhiyi is unhappy after seeing Guo En making fun of Minfei. (重)敏妃被国恩的电话吵醒，来到联络所才发现国恩要她当义医，两人因中西医的不同理论而争吵起来。国恩毫不顾忌地替香港脚病人看诊，其认真态度让敏妃佩服。国恩捉弄敏妃，被芝仪碰见，心里很不是滋味。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 338
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 下一站。遇见 Hello Miss Driver - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Chen Xi always thinks that she is her father's only child, until his death does she realise she actually has a stepsister Yu Lin and an intellectually disabled older brother Yu Xing. She suddenly realises that her mother is a third party. Chen Xi's stepmother Wan Yi and Yu Lin are helpless to the sudden drastic change. Chen Xi decides to shoulder the responsibility of managing her father's funeral. (PG)(重)晨曦深受父亲维州疼爱，一直以为自己是个独生女。不料一天父亲突然暴毙，晨曦赫然发现父亲其实另有家庭，她还有同父异母的姐姐宇琳以及智商有问题的哥哥宇星，自己的母亲竟是小三！大妈婉仪和宇琳面对巨变茫然无措，晨曦只好担起处理父亲后事的责任。.

programme.title: 一家之宝 Our Family Joy - EP 3

programme.desc: (Part 2) Yongzheng is upset that Chengfeng acquired his friend's soy sauce factory to sell the land for profit. He is determined to boycott Chengfeng. (PG)(第35集下)永正不满乘风收购老友酱油厂再卖出地皮图利，向家人提出罢免他。贝儿婚后与文隽相处愉快，夫妻恩爱，令杨太及许氏夫妇都放下心头大石。怎料，当文隽准备去接贝儿时，却遭遇一场车祸。.

programme.title: 小偏方大拆解 Health Hacks - EP 3
programme.desc: Regardless of gender, everyone wants to lose weight to have a good body shape. When determination & perseverance are insufficient, one will try out various folk remedies to lose weight. In this episode, let us take a look at the folk remedies which are effective and which will have counter-effects. 无论男女都想拥有一副好身材，瘦身减肥不分男女，其关键在于决心和毅力。当减肥者决心不够，毅力不足时，便会尝试各种减肥偏方。到底哪些偏方不妨一试？哪些偏方会带来反效果？就让我们在这一集的节目中一一拆解。.

programme.title: 星期二特写- 筑梦 2 Tuesday Report - The Dream Catchers 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: In 1998, Khoo Swee Chiow became one of the two team members of the Singapore Mount Everest expedition team to reach the summit. The grandeur of Mount Everest inspired him to become a full time adventurer. The motto 'dare to dream', spurred him on to overcome challenges like his fear of heights, along this journey of dream catching. 1998年，邱瑞昭成为两名代表新加坡登上世界最高峰、珠穆朗玛峰的其中一人，全职探险生涯就此展开。然而，从小惧高、没有全职从事探险活动的先例可循，都是实现探险梦路上的层层障碍。他如何迎难而上、勇敢追梦？.

programme.title: 回路网 All Around You - EP 2
programme.desc: Actress Siyu, embroiled in a cheating scandal, turns to Shadow for help. Another incident at a bakery occurs as negative image spirals out of control online. Disagreement on how to save the failing bakery leads to friction between father, son and niece. (PG)当红女艺人马思羽卷入小三丑闻，找Shadow帮忙。欣彤却揭发真正的小三是思羽的好友可儿，帮思羽挽回形象。面包店发生面包里藏有死壁虎事件，网友纷纷讨伐。老板文添的儿子找Shadow帮忙，但文添不认同欣彤提出的解决方案，拂袖而去。.

But what cautions should be taken when picking or consuming wild leaves from Nature's pharmacy? (重)人说野生叶子往往不比菜叶好吃，入口往往是为了养生保健。早年许多老人家懂得辨认和食用草药叶，做到生病不求医；近年本地更时兴草本养生。像桑叶、艾叶、黑面将军等叶子又获得瞩目和青睐。想采摘或食用野生叶子，什么要注意？.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 84
programme.desc: (R) Jie Jie demands an explanation from Da Gong. Da Gong admits that Da Li is his brother, and reveals that he has mental issues, resulting in the loss of his family. The brothers result to cheating in order to support his family who is back in Vietnam. (PG)(重)洁洁质问大功为何要骗她，大功先发制人，坦承和大利是兄弟关系，并透露大利因伤导致精神出状况，并且妻离子散。为了寄钱给在越南的老婆，偶尔就用不法手段骗人钱财。大功虚虚实实，洁洁听得半信半疑。.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 169
programme.desc: (R) This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. (重)在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 小小传奇 Gonna Make It - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Zheng Gang and Mei Ru attempt to buy off Xiao Xiao and make her leave Oscar. The couple try to make Xiao Xiao leave Oscars place. Zhen Zhu enters the fray, and meet Zheng Gang and Mei Ru. The couple realises that Xiao Xiao is Zhen Zhus daughter. (PG)(重)正刚和美如企图以金钱收买小小，逼她离开Oscar，小小不为所动。两人也对Oscar很不满，要赶小小离开Oscar家。众人闹成一团时，珍珠找上门来，与正刚和美如见面，不禁一愣，正刚和美如意外得知小小是珍珠的女儿。.

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Guo En is hurt and hospitalised after rescuing Zhiyi. Minfei saw Zhiyi sleeping by Guo En's side in the room. Zhiyi explained to Guo En that she spend the night over at the hospital as she suspects she is being followed by Zhixiong. Qingmei asked Zhiyi to move over to their place. Seeing Guo En has no objections, Zhiyi happily assumes Guo En is giving their relationship a second chance. (重)国恩为救芝仪而受伤入院，芝仪在病房依偎国恩而睡，被敏妃看见。芝仪接国恩出院后，解释自己怀疑被志雄跟踪，才会到国恩病房过夜。清梅建议芝仪搬到家里住，芝仪见国恩不反对，顿觉国恩已经重新接受自己，暗自欣喜。.

programme.title: 下一站。遇见 Hello Miss Driver - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Liu Yi decides to leave Singapore earlier than planned, Chen Xi rushes to the airport. Chen Xi is shocked when Liu Yi initiates a break up with her. When Yu Lin appears, Chen Xi then realises Liu Yi and Yu Lin are together. Yu Lin criticises Chen Xi for destroying her family and snatching everything that belonged to her, but boasts sarcastically that everything belonging to Chen Xi has now returned to her. Chen Xi finally discovers Yu Lin's true colour. (PG)(重)刘毅提早出国，晨曦赶到机场。刘毅向晨曦提出分手，晨曦愕然。宇琳出现，晨曦才知两人已走在一起。宇琳指责晨曦母女破坏了她的家庭，抢走原本属于她的东西，现在属于晨曦的东西都回到她手里了。晨曦终看清了宇琳的真面目。.

programme.title: 节庆。风味 A Taste of Festival - EP 10
programme.desc: The host invites experts to share the origin of Hungry Ghost Festival & learns about sesame rice dough, tortoise bun & other offerings. He also attends a temple fair. Chef Benson demonstrates how to make tasty & creative vegetarian dishes at home as one has to go vegetarian before the temple fair. 主持人找来专家让观众认识中元节的由来；到老字号饼家了解油麻团、乌龟包等供品的制作；有幸参与庙会庆典，感受民众酬神谢神的欢腾气氛。名厨唐本陞示范，庙会庆典斋戒期间，在家如何做出美味创意兼备的蔬食。.

programme.title: 回路网 All Around You - EP 3
programme.desc: A tipsy Shiyang was mistaken by Ruohua to be a Peeping Tom. Xintong and team steps in to catch the real perpetrator, proving Shiyang's innocence. Ruohua, guilt-ridden because of her wrongful accusations, apologises to Shiyang. Meanwhile Shiyang unexpectedly warms up to Ruohua as a result of the incident. (PG)世洋因喝醉，被一女子若华误认为是偷窥狂，双方起争执，若华还将世洋的手表弄坏。欣彤及时捉到偷窥狂，还世洋清白。若华内疚，答应帮世洋修理手表，却另送了一只名贵手表给他赔罪，两人感情迅速升温。.

Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺 Golden Age Talentime - EP 22
programme.desc: A popular singing competition which provides the elderly with a platform to showcase their singing talent. 这个深受乐龄人士欢迎的歌唱比赛为爱唱歌的乐龄朋友提供了演出的平台。.

programme.title: 没那么简单 Life Hacks - EP 4
programme.desc: Hosted by Kym and Pornsak, Life Hacks shares smart tips that make life easier! Find out what you should do when there is no one to care for your plants when you travel, what easy tricks to make dull leather sparkly as new, what you should do to make wooden flooring clean and shiny. Guest artistes of the week are Elvin Ng, Lee Teng, Sheila Sim and Sora Ma. 有常识跑遍天下，想当个常识王吗？由钟琴和Pornsak携手的节目，教你各种千奇百怪和意想不到的生活妙招。家中物品生锈了，你知道如何解决吗？不爱吃葡萄皮，如何快速的剥皮呢？银器氧化变黑了怎么办？别担心，各种生活琐事没那么简单？只要知道其中原理，其实很简单！嘉宾艺人：郑惠玉，王禄江，洪慧芳，陈罗密欧。.

programme.title: 狮城有约精华版 Hello Singapore Highlights - EP 244
programme.desc: Deliver social features that matter to you. 总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。.

programme.title: 回路网 All Around You - EP 3
programme.desc: A tipsy Shiyang was mistaken by Ruohua to be a Peeping Tom. Xintong and team steps in to catch the real perpetrator, proving Shiyang's innocence. Ruohua, guilt-ridden because of her wrongful accusations, apologises to Shiyang. Meanwhile Shiyang unexpectedly warms up to Ruohua as a result of the incident. 世洋因喝醉，被一女子若华误认为是偷窥狂，双方起争执，若华还将世洋的手表弄坏。欣彤及时捉到偷窥狂，还世洋清白。若华内疚，答应帮世洋修理手表，却另送了一只名贵手表给他赔罪，两人感情迅速升温。.

programme.title: 晨光第一线 Morning Express - EP 244
programme.desc: (Live) A daily brand new News belt, from Monday to Friday, 9am - 9.30am. （现场直播）全新新闻时段，每逢星期一至五，早上九点，准时送上。.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 36
programme.desc: (36A) After Wenjun's death, Mrs Yang issues a legal notice demanding the Xus repay the debt of $5 billion within a month. Yongzheng is notified that Chengfeng is planning to take over the company. Liang Zan rallies everyone to kick Chengfeng out of the Board, but Chengfeng claims that he has become the biggest shareholder of the company.(36B) Weijia returns from Portugal, and tells Chengfeng that he is taking back his share of the company. When Chengfeng refuses, Weijia decides to file a lawsu (36A)文隽不幸意外身亡，许家立即收到杨太的律师信，要他们一个月内还清五十亿债务。志明通知永正，指乘风有意侵吞家昌旺。梁赞打算集合众人的持股量将乘风赶出局，但乘风表示自己已成为大股东。(36B)围家从葡萄牙回港，向乘风表明要取回自己股份但被拒绝。于是围家决定对簿公堂。法庭上，乘风提供有力证据，胜算十足。.

programme.title: 寻花探草 Sr 1 Garden Of Treasure S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: "Garden Of Treasure " is a documentary on the healing functions and botanical characteristics of wild flowers and herbs which can also be used to cook simple and delicious flower dishes. 《寻花探草》是以药草拍摄为主的纪录片，介绍他们心目中的百搭花草，逐一分享花草的药疗功能和植物特性, 也化成一道道简单好味的花草料理。.

programme.title: 家和万事兴 Lee's Family Reunion - EP 200
programme.desc: Passed down from generation to generation, the Li Ji Cake Shop has a hundred-year history to boast about. However, though the Li family look happy on the outside, there are conflicts aplenty behind closed doors. (PG)《李记饼铺》代代相传已有百年，看似幸福美满的三代同堂，其实暗潮汹涌。老太爷李万世育有二子，长子再传留在饼店里帮忙，私生子再兴则流落在外，生活潦倒。主演：黄少褀饰高天诚，六月饰陈慧心，韩瑜饰李正男，方文琳饰罗秀琴。.

programme.title: 118 II 118 S2 - EP 85
programme.desc: Jin Zhi lures the killer out, resulting in Deng Bo subduing him and leading him to the police. Deng Bo refuses to let Jin Zhi take any other risks, much to Jin Zhi's annoyance. 金枝欲以自己为饵，引杀手出来，让邓波抓住他交给警方，那杀害臭小子的幕后真凶也就无所遁形了，但邓波却说金枝想得太简单，坚持不让她去冒险，金枝讥讽他是个不合格的保镖。.

programme.title: 小鲤鱼历险记 The Adv Of Little Carp - EP 8
programme.desc: The beautiful Carps Lake suffers the scourge of the evil snake. The small Carp Pao Pao was forced to swim out of his desolate homeland in search of the power of the dragon. He makes the acquaintances of the cowardly two-sided turtle, the arrogant A Ku and the delicate Mei Mei. 美丽的鲤鱼湖遭受了癞皮蛇的祸害，小鲤鱼泡泡被迫游出凄凉的家乡，寻找龙的力量。他先后结识了胆小的双面龟，傲气的阿酷，娇柔的美美。.

programme.title: 小小传奇 Gonna Make It - EP 13
programme.desc: Zheng Gang realizes from Zhen Zhu that Xiao Xiao is his biological daughter. He tries to spend time with her, but Xiao Xiao remains cold and aloof. He subtly tries to get Wen Ya to give up on Oscar, but she is more determined to get him back. Zheng Gang is worried for Xiao Xiao. 正刚从珍珠口中得知小小是自己的女儿后，便故意制造机会出现在小小身边，而且态度完全改变，却遭小小冷淡对待。正刚婉转劝文雅放弃Oscar，谁知文雅却矢言要抢回Oscar，正刚暗自为小小感到担心。.

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 10
programme.desc: Guo En tells Minfei to attend a surprise date specially arranged for her. Minfei is excited as she assumes Guo En is taking the opportunity to confess his feelings for her. However, Guo En shows up with Lin Xi in the wheelchair. Minfei is disappointed when the surprise turns out to be Lin Xi. 国恩邀敏妃晚上务必准时出席他安排的约会，因为将有重大的惊喜给她！敏妃以为国恩想对自己告白，满怀期待地在餐厅等着，却见国恩推着坐在轮椅上的林西出现。原来所谓的惊喜就是林西，敏妃大失所望。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 341
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. 赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 下一站。遇见 Hello Miss Driver - EP 4
programme.desc: Wen Liang is worried about Chen Xi who was just betrayed by her boyfriend. Unexpectedly, Chen Xi borrows money from him to pay the drivers, and goes for a feast afterwards. Wen Liang feels puzzled. Chen Xi then tells him that it is pointless to feel sad about the breakup and she also does not have the time to feel sad because she still has a lot of matters to handle. Wen Liang admires Chen Xi. 文良关心遭到背叛的晨曦，不料晨曦突然向他借钱还给司机，还去大快朵颐，文良感困惑。晨曦说刘毅和宇琳都不值得自己为他们伤心难过，她也没有时间伤心，因为还有很多事情等着她去处理。文良为晨曦感到心折。.

programme.title: 新语研究所 2 Fun With SINGnese S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Fun with SINGnese 2 continues to explore the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words. This episode discusses how the terms Ah Sia Kia (son of rich family), Lao Dou (father), Da Bo Gong (scapegoat), Er Shu Gong (pawnshop) came about, and why we say call or shout when placing orders. 《新语研究所2》和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。为什么有钱人家的子弟也叫做阿舍仔？为什么爸爸也叫做老豆，替人顶罪的也叫做大伯公，当铺也叫做二叔公？为什么我们叫菜、叫水，而不是说点餐、点饮料？.

programme.title: 回路网 All Around You - EP 4
programme.desc: Zifei, a student and victim of a voyeurism incident that occurred in school seeks justice online when she felt dissatisfied with the light punishment imposed on the perpetrator, Zack. Online debate escalates, while Shadow steps in to calm the storm, unveiling deeper truths to the incident. 大学发生偷窥事件，Zack Lee因偷窥女生冲凉而被校方处罚停学一个学期，受害女生曾子菲因处罚过轻而心有不甘，在网上公开事件，引起网络热议。网友认为Zack有后台撑腰，也不满校方包庇偷窥狂，事件延烧。.

programme.desc: Mt Shu is Jiang Hu's number one sect for many years. In order to protect the world from harm, Zhuge Yuwo placed the enchanted gem into Ding Yin's body to prevent it from being stolen. Later, Ding Yin went to Mt Shu to practise his sword skills, aiming to seek revenge on Lv Pao. (重)蜀山派是江湖第一名门正派，一直领导武林多年。蜀山掌门诸葛驭我为保天下，对抗企图抢夺赤魂石的绿袍尊者，把赤魂石打入天赋异秉的丁隐体内，丁隐由此拜入蜀山门下修习剑法，誓要练成蜀山绝学，替天下百姓向绿袍尊者寻仇。.

programme.title: 我赚到了！ Thrift Hunters - EP 3
programme.desc: To live a healthy life, we can learn to grow vegetables on a farm which will ensure healthy eating, adding joy to our lives. For office workers, they can go for various free exercise classes which not only benefit their health but also earn points to redeem rewards vouchers. Enjoying "forest bathing" class in nature is another activity which helps city folks to relax & de-stress. 要拥有健康的生活，可以到农场学种菜苗，让自己吃得健康也增添生活乐趣，还有上班族在下班后，可结伴参加多项免费的运动课程，不但赚到金钱和健康又能赢取礼券，而透过五官来感受大自然的"森林浴"也绝对能让都市人舒缓身心和减压。.

programme.title: 乔太守乱点鸳鸯 Comedy Of Mismatches
programme.desc: A dazzling tale of mistaken identities caused by monogram handkerchiefs. Ting Hong, Koo Mei and Li Hsiang Chun are just three of the lovelies on view in this "All's Well Ends Well" marital mixup. 孙玉郎与慧娘、裴政与徐文姑于庙中邂逅，一见钟情,暗中互换巾、扇定情，匆忙间却误递对象，致错配姻缘。玉姊珠姨与慧兄朴早有婚约，刘母因朴久病不愈，执意娶珠过门冲喜。玉不忍姊下嫁病夫，男扮女装代姊出嫁，与易钗而弁代兄拜堂的慧于新房重逢，二人得悉一切后结成真夫妇。.

programme.title: 欢喜没烦恼 Happy-Go-Lucky - EP 7
programme.desc: Oh no! Happy Street is in a mess now after a con man appears and tries to cheat the folks of their money and feelings! Meanwhile, the production team brings us back to Taiwan once again. Watch Taiwanese soap drama lead actor Jun Fu as he spends the day with 82-year-old athlete grandma who brings him on a hike and talks about her exciting life. 糟糕！欢喜街来了一个骗子，把街坊们都搞得团团转！骗子不只骗钱，还骗感情！这次到底会闯出什么祸呢？另一头，制作组再次把我带回台湾，看看台湾乡土男主角傅子纯跟着82岁的运动员婆婆一起去爬山，聊聊她的精彩人生。.

What will the outcome be? (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)厨房大婶明明有拍到部落客闹事的视频，雅兰却决定不公开视频为吴春平反，反而擅自以吴春的名义上传一篇道歉文向部落客道歉。雅兰计划让吴春扛下所有罪名，平息事件。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 20

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 17

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)瑛溢在德浩的事务所找不到李明俊偷藏的郑会长秘密资金账簿后，再命手下去德浩工作人员的家全面羁押搜查，务必要找到郑会长的秘密资金账簿。海卿不顾父亲信佑的阻止，与恩祖他们帮德浩搜集证据，以洗脱他的杀人罪名。.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 Puzzle Masters - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Puzzle Masters is the ultimate competition for any young undiscovered puzzle wizards who are looking for a challenge and want to be mentored by the best Puzzle Masters the world has to offer. It scours the nation to find the cleverest, smartest, most complete puzzle solvers. 100 budding apprentices are invited to take part in the competition, and faces tough tests in 6 categories: inductive reasoning, calculation, observation, memorization, spatial thinking, and creativity. (重)江苏卫视推出的一档大型脑力偶像竞技真人秀，由王峰、王昱珩、鲍橒担任队长，刘国梁担任战术指导，陶晶莹担任常驻嘉宾，每期还有特邀明星嘉宾的加入。第一轮挑战就是晋级30强的百人淘汰赛，一百位选手同台比赛，最终只有30人成功晋级挑战赛，其余选手全部淘汰出局。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore Sr 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and English)(R) In the season premiere, Peifen exposes the secret stashes of people on our island. Collectors and their precious collections. Peifen enters a curious emporium in Ang Mo Kio with some of the rarest vintage beauty products. Discover also a man who's simply in love with locks. And a typewriter with a connection to J.R.R. Tolkien, the English writer famed for his The Lord of the Rings books. (重)(双声道-中/英)搜密新加坡第二系列节目带你穿街走巷寻访被遗忘的历史、私密的隐匿处、有趣的人物和另类工作，给你满满的惊喜！追随主持人的脚步踏上任务之旅，一起破解谜团、搜寻不为人知的地点、走访有趣故事的人物及探索本地让人咋舌的事项。.

programme.title: 生活达人 Life's Perfectionists S9 - EP 12
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm. (重)(双声道-中/韩)本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Even with a Master's degree, Taiwanese graduates struggle with low starting pay with some forced to look for brighter prospects in a night market stall. For a working single mother to own a piece of property, taking on 3 jobs makes barely enough to pay for hefty housing loan. And even into his seventies, an elderly part time worker struggles with high tuition and pricey private school fees to enable his teenage daughter to compete effectively. (重)硕士毕业生面对学历贬值、薪水低的‘闷世代'，选择在夜市摆摊。单亲妈妈身兼三职， 只为供房、供女儿念大学。72岁的资深编辑老来被迫接受低薪来养家。一起进入台北打工仔的生活， 了解他们辛勤工作的动力。.

programme.title: 消失中的亚洲食物 Vanishing Foods - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) China's literati is said to eat better than the emperor. Bringing the pursuit of refinement into food, they create dishes like Henan's Zu An Smoked Mandarin Fish, with demanding fire control, and intricate "flower knife work" which gets the fish curling like a blossom when fried. (重)据说中国文人其实吃的比皇帝还讲究。为了将对精致的追求带入料理中，他们在制作河南祖安烟熏桂鱼之类的菜肴时，为了达到最佳的烟熏效果他们非常严格地掌控火候，而复杂的“雕刻工艺”也能使鱼在煎炸时像花一样卷曲。.

programme.title: 退休地图 Retiring in Paradise - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Tony Hung brings audience into the retirement world and introduce the different countries suitable for retirement at affordable costs. (重)洪永成带着观众的退休梦，亲身寻访地图上既符合大家预算，又可轻松退休的地方。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 21
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Juxi suggests that Wu Chun joins the company's wine brewing team as she thinks Wu Chun has the talent and the right attitude. Yalan protests against that decision, but Juxi is determined to give Wu Chun a chance. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)菊熙觉得吴春有酿酒的天份，工作态度又好，于是向泰浩提议让吴春加入公司的酿酒组。雅兰抗议，但菊熙却不加以理会。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 22
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Wu Chun discovers to her disbelief that Meida had accepted Yalan's money previously and had even spent half of the money. Wu Chun returns the rest of the money to Yalan. Juxi overhears the conversation between Yalan and Wu Chun and is disappointed to realise that Yalan had not apologized to Wu Chun. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴春惊讶地发现美达之前收下雅兰的钱，还已经花了一半。吴春把剩下的钱拿到公司还给雅兰，两人的互动被菊熙看见，菊熙这才知道雅兰根本没有向吴春道歉。菊熙感叹没有教好雅兰。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 19
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Zhixu beseeches his father to let him handle the Amazon energy drink case and summons Chairman Zheng to court. He also takes the opportunity to ask his father to sever all ties with Chairman Zheng. Haiqing tells Dehao she will ignore her father and stand by his side this time. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)志旭请求父亲让他处理“大力王"能量饮料的案件，召唤郑会长上庭，并趁机要父亲脱离与郑会长之间相连的那条肮脏的交易绳索，不再受郑会长摆布。海卿去找德浩告诉他她这次是站在他对的那方，不怕父亲的责骂。.

programme.title: 邻家律师赵德浩 My Lawyer, Mr Joe - EP 20
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Yingyi asks Dehao to pass him Chairman Zheng's accounts book so that he can arrest Chairman Zheng. Dehao knows Yingyi is colluding with Chairman Zheng so he refuses. Ailuo and Daxiu disguise as cleaner and patient respectively to keep an eye on Chairman Zheng in the hospital. They inform Dehao immediately when they spot Michael Zheng visiting Chairman Zheng. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)瑛溢要德浩把郑会长那本人头账户账簿交给他，由他来捉郑会长，但德浩知道他与郑会长狼狈为奸，拒绝了他。爱萝乔装医院清洁工人和大修乔装病人，在医院监视郑会长。他们见到麦可郑从外国回来探病，立刻通报德浩。.

programme.title: 中国梦之声：我们的歌 Young Forever - EP 5
programme.desc: "Young Forever" is a new music variety where established singers such as Hacken Lee, Fei Yu Qing, Grasshoppers, Francis Yip will pair with the new generation of singers like Henry Lau, Mao Bu Yi, Hua Chen Yu etc to perform a re-arranged song in their own style. "中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 19
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Xu Ren and Yanjing have fun after their free consultation session. Xu Ren finds it a very enjoyable day. He thinks he can live peacefully like this forever. However, he does not know that the director, Ma Shengtai is doing everything possible now to get him back to the hospital. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)许任和妍京义诊完了之后就到处去玩.许任觉得这是非常快乐的一天。许任本以为从此可以这样平静快乐地过日子，但却不知马圣泰院长正在想方设法要将许任弄回医院。.

programme.title: 名不虚传 Live Up To Your Name - EP 20
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Grandpa Qianshu has been framed and gets detained in the police station. Xu Ren knows that someone is behind the incident. The police find out that Qianshu has a criminal record which is bad for Grandpa Qianshu. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)千述爷爷遭人陷害，被关进了警察局。许任很清楚这件事是有人在搞鬼。警方查了千述的资料，发现他在20年前也有过案底。这对爷爷十分不利。.

programme.title: 守护者 The Guardians - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Everyone wishes to be taken care of in old age. Still, many lonely old people continue to live alone, some awaiting deaths on hospital beds. In Malaysia, a group of community heroes go above and beyond to help these elderly in need. (重)老有所依，老有所养，是自古以来华人社会所追求的一大理想。然而，在现代社会，却有很多孤独老人蜗居空巢，更有老人被遗弃在医院的病榻上，任生命凋零。在马来西亚，有一群秉持“老吾老以及人之老"理念的 “社区英雄"，义不容辞，坚持好好守护孤苦无依的老人家。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 2 Mars Vs Venus 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Why are Singaporean women not marriage material? Are Singaporean men simply not good enough? Formal TV presenter Diana Ser joins the panel this week and shares her thoughts on this juicy topic. What will the Martians do to protect their pride and dignity? Let's find out! (重)久违了的美丽人妻徐秀盈首次上节目！身为新加坡女人，她是否认为新加坡女人嫁不出全都是受新加坡男人牵连？郑斌辉和苏梽诚要如何反驳和争辩，为新加坡男人保住立场！看了这集，你会对新加坡女人和男人有不同的看法！.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 73
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Hengkui finds out that Shanyu has cancer and does not have long to live. Hengkui asks overseas hospitals for their opinions, but all reply with grim news. Hengkui regrets not treating Shanyu well all these years. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亨奎质问家人后发现珊玉患癌，寿命最多剩下6个月。亨奎打听外国的医院但得到的答案都不乐观。亨奎后悔当初没有好好地对待珊玉。.

programme.title: 超完美秘书 Jugglers - EP 12
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Zhiyuan finds out from Taili that Yunli is going for a blind date. He anxiously rushes over to the venue where Yunli is having her blind date and drags her away. Meanwhile, Shangwu has landed an important marketing project. He hands the project to Baona to get her on board with him. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)致原从泰利那儿听说允利去相亲，便很紧张地去她相亲的地方把她拉走。另一边尚武拿到一份重要的宣传行销企划。为了让宝娜与他一条心地做事，他将这个宣传行销企划交给了宝娜。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 57
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Jiang Bidong collapses and Xixun takes him to the hospital. Xixun found a cut out of his search advertisement in Bidong's pocket. Once Bidong woke, Xixun told him that the advertisement was put up by him in search of his father. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)江必东晕倒, 锡勋赶紧送他入院. 不料锡勋在江必东口袋里找到寻人启事剪章,当江必东苏醒后, 锡勋告诉他人启事是他登的. 他正在寻找亲生父亲.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 58
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Guizhen is shocked to hear that Mingui and Douna are married. Junxiang saw Bidong's photo in Xixun's file. Xixun tells him that Bidong is his long lost father which puzzled Junxiang. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)贵贞得知敏圭与斗娜已经结婚,大受打击. 俊相看到江必东照片在锡勋文件夹里, 锡勋说江必东是他的父亲, 俊相感到不可思议.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 11
programme.desc: Hulk makes a surprise appearance to meet Pepper and confesses that he hasn't gotten over her at all. Hulk finally learns that he truly wants Pepper back into his life and he has even broken up with Officer Xinyi to prove he is serious about it. Pepper is at a lost and isn't sure if she should accept him back. Back in camp, Pepper and her platoon mates are getting ready to take their SIT test which will determine if they are fit to go into Officer Cadet School. (PG)Hulk跟Pepper道歉，并坦言自己心里还是无法忘记Pepper，所以跟何欣怡分手了，并希望Pepper可以接受自己。Pepper一时矛盾，无法回答。回到军营后，她和其他女兵必须准备Sit Test，却没想到Sit Test的考官就是何欣怡。.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 第一辑 As Long As You Live S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. (最后一集)全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 21
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Shan'ni and Wangzhi sneaks into Enlan's secret room. Enlan has expected them to do so and plans to catch them in the act. Baihu rescues Shan'ni and Wangzhi. Enlan picks up a button and suspects that Wangzhi has been helping Shan'ni. Suzhen helps Wangzhi when he is interrogated by Enlan. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)珊妮和王植潜进恩兰的花园。恩兰早料到他们会有此举动，于是到密室捉人。白虎帮助二人逃脱。恩兰在密室里捡到一枚护卫队的袖扣，怀疑王植就是那个一直在暗中帮助珊妮的人。恩兰质问王植，素珍及时赶到为王植解围。.

programme.title: 边缘老人 Twilight Years - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) In the past, Lepers were isolated in remote areas in order to control the spread of the disease. But leprosy today is no longer an incurable disease. In Vietnam's Thai Binh, some 100 lepers who have now recovered, still remain isolated from society. What is the impact of the stigma on their life? (重)为了控制麻风病的传播，早期越南的麻风病患者都被隔离在越南各偏远地区。如今，麻风病已不再是绝症，这些麻风病痊愈者却仍然无法重返社会。因为社会舆论，有些麻风病痊愈者被迫与世隔绝超过50年。究竟社会舆论带给病愈的老人怎样的影响？.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 74
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Xuncai creates an opportunity for Shanyu to spend time alone with Zhen-ai. Shanyu takes the chance to tell Zhen-ai about her illness. Hengkui starts to help out at the shop, but Mr Jin informs them that Shanyu has decided to end her business. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)勋才安排珊玉跟真爱去泡温泉。珊玉乘两人单独时将病情告诉真爱。亨奎开始到小菜店帮忙，金社长却在这时通知他们珊玉已经决定结业了。.

programme.title: 超完美秘书 Jugglers - EP 13
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Yunli helps Zhiyuan prepare New Year gifts for colleagues. This time, Zhiyuan does not blame her for being a busybody. He is curious to see whether Yunli gets him a gift and he deliberately buys a pair of bunny slippers for her. Someone from the insurance company looks for Jingai. They suspect Jingai and her husband are scamming on the insurance as her husband bought an insurance policy with big payout before his disappearance. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)允利替致原准备了新年礼物送给公司的同事，这一次致原没有责怪她多管闲事。他很好奇地想看允利有没有给自己准备礼物，并特意地选了一双兔子拖鞋给她。保险公司的人来找静爱。因为静爱的丈夫在失踪之前买入大笔保额的意外险，保险公司因此怀疑是他们在骗保。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 59
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Junxiang is disappointed that his biological father, Jiang Bidong could not recognise him when he returns him the car key that he dropped. Meanwhile, Minxi watches them from afar. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)江必东捡到俊相丢失的车匙,便还给俊相. 而在江必东面前,他却不认得自己的儿子,令俊相失望.站在远处的敏熙注视着这一幕.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 60
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Minxi suspects that Junxiang is Jiang Bidong's son, Jiang Xinyu. Junxiang denied. Qiuzi is surprised that Xixue did not perform a DNA test with Jiang Bidong. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)敏熙怀疑俊相是江必东儿子江信宇, 俊相否认. 锡勋没有与江必东做亲子检验,令秋子好奇.

programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean) Enlan adds peanuts to Yali's biscuits and puts the blame on Shan'ni when Yali has an allergic reaction. Jiangxi is furious with Enlan for risking Yali's life. She thus tells Li He how Enlan sabotaged the Empress Zhaoxian seven years ago. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)恩兰为了尽快除掉珊妮，故意在雅莉要吃的饼干加入花生，让雅莉出现过敏症状，然后嫁祸给珊妮。江熙见恩兰没有顾及雅莉的安全，愤怒地将七年前恩兰如何陷害昭贤皇后的事告诉李赫，要李赫别再被恩兰摆布。.

programme.title: 注定 Show Hand - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Do we lead a fated life or do we decide our own destiny? Cast: Christopher Lee, Chew Chor Meng, Cynthia Koh, Ann Kok, Ian Fang, Kimberly Chia. (PG)(重)(大结局)人生每一个关口的决定，是早就被'注定'了，还是等待自己来'决定'呢？演员: 李铭顺, 周初明, 许美珍, 郭舒贤, 方伟杰, 谢静仪。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) In Hokkaido, there is a forgotten group of people known as the Ainu, they sing and dance to express their love for the Earth and believe in animism. They have ever been discriminated and exploited but the Japanese Cabinet passed new bill to recognise them as the indigenous people. Who are they? (重)(最后一集)日本北海道，住着一群被遗忘的族群，以歌舞传颂对大地的敬爱，相信万物皆有灵，他们就是爱奴人。他们曾经被歧视和剥削，日本内阁会议通过新法案承认爱奴为原住民。打破日本单一民族的神话。究竟，爱奴人是谁？.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 75
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Hengkui loses his ability to speak due to immense grief. Shanyu is informed that her cancer has not spread and she is expected to live longer. At the same time, Caili announces that she is pregnant too. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亨奎因为悲伤过度，突然说不出话来。珊玉去做身体检查。医生说珊玉的身体状况保持得很好，癌细胞没有继续扩散，应该可以活得更久一点。这时采莉发现她也怀孕了。全家人沉浸在愉悦的气氛中。.

programme.title: 超完美秘书 Jugglers - EP 14
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Yunli feels a bit disturbed and jealous when she sees Zhiyuan's ex-wife Daoxi going for dinner with Zhiyuan and the vice president. Shangwu overhears rumours in the office that Zhiyuan might get promoted to vice president and that he will be left sitting on the bench. This makes him very furious. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)允利在下班时看到致原的前妻道熙挎着致原和副社长一起出去吃晚餐，不免有点不安和吃醋。尚武在公司听到致原可能晋升副社长，而他将会坐冷板凳的传言，让他感到十分生气。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 87
programme.desc: Ep 61:Jiang Bidong introduces himself as Xixun's father to Junxiang but the latter looks at him with disgust. Jiang Bidong asks Xixun to do a DNA test so that he can confirm their biological relationship. Ep 61:江必东介绍自己为锡勋父亲,令俊相反感. 江必东建议锡勋做亲子检验以确证他们的关系.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 89
programme.desc: Ep 62: Minxi comes to know that Xixun and Junxiang are switched after talking to Jiang Bidong. She asks her mother to get Jiang Bidong's hair so that she can do a DNA test with Junxiang. Ep 62:敏熙与江必东谈话后,发现锡勋与俊相小时候被掉换.她吩咐贵贞偷取江必东的头发,与俊相做亲子检验.

programme.title: 消失中的亚洲食物 Vanishing Foods - EP 7
programme.desc: Among the four styles of cooking that make up Kyoto's cuisine, obanzai or traditional cooking is the least known. Aun discovers that even as some of their dishes are served at restaurants and sold at stores, Kyoto residents are losing the knowledge and skill to cook what they call soul foods. 京都料理“Obanzai”是传统烹饪手法中最鲜为人知的。它是京都人的家传美食，简单却极具风韵。但美食博客许安却发现虽然传统菜肴都很家常，京都人其实缺乏一些相关知识与手法来烹饪出他们所谓的“灵魂料理”。.

programme.title: 退休地图 Retiring in Paradise - EP 7
programme.desc: Tony Hung brings audience into the retirement world and introduce the different countries suitable for retirement at affordable costs. 洪永成带着观众的退休梦，亲身寻访地图上既符合大家预算，又可轻松退休的地方。.

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 21
programme.desc: Ep 23: Enlan holds a book sharing session at the palace with the aim of exposing that Helu is not Vincent Lee. Li Yun appears. He announces that he is the real Vincent Lee and that he has witnessed how Empress Zhaoxian fell into the pond seven years ago. Ep 24: Shan'ni leads Li He into thinking that the late Empress's body might have been buried in Enlan's garden. Li He goes in search of the body. Li Yun leads the media to the garden where they see Li He digging furiously. The public suspect Ep 23: 恩兰为了揭发荷露不是文森李，故意在皇宫举办分享会。珊妮要李赫当场朗读小说中的一段文章。李赫发现情节竟然跟昭贤皇后去世的情形相似。李允现身，公开自己才是真正的文森李，还说他当年目睹昭贤皇后落水的一幕，要皇室交待昭贤皇后的死因。Ep 24: 李允的小说写着死者的遗体被调换，但后埋葬。李赫怀疑李允知道更多内情，于是派千优彬拿昭贤皇后的骨灰去化验。化验结果显示那不是人的骨灰。随后，珊妮引导李赫怀疑太后当年并把昭贤皇后埋在花园里。李赫到花园找尸体的举动被媒体拍摄下来。民众怀疑李赫跟昭贤皇后的死有关。.

(最后一集)“谁来晚餐”是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露。.

programme.title: 极境之旅 Forbidding No More - EP 13
programme.desc: Having experienced the magical Istria Peninsula, this episode of "Forbidding No More" continues down South, along the coast of the majestic Adriatic Sea, to explore what the Dalmatia region of Croatia has to offer. 经历了伊斯特拉半岛的精彩，这一集的《极境之旅》继续往克罗地亚的南部前进，沿着美丽的亚得里亚海，探索达尔马提亚地区的迷人魅力。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 54
programme.desc: Ep 75: Hengkui loses his ability to speak due to immense grief. Shanyu is informed that her cancer has not spread and she is expected to live longer. At the same time, Caili announces that she is pregnant too.Ep 76: Dongchu and Shanyu hold a wedding ceremony. Dongchu also renovates their room to cheer Shanyu up. Shanyu passes away after experiencing a series of delightful events. Ep 75: 亨奎因为悲伤过度，突然说不出话来。珊玉去做身体检查。医生说珊玉的身体状况保持得很好，癌细胞没有继续扩散，应该可以活得更久一点。这时采莉发现她也怀孕了。全家人沉浸在愉悦的气氛中。Ep 76: 东出跟珊玉举办二度婚礼，还将房间装修了一番。珊玉怀抱着满满的幸福离世。.

programme.title: 超完美秘书 Jugglers - EP 13

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 91
programme.desc: Ep 63:Minxi discovers that Xixun and Jiang Bidong are not biologically related from the DNA report. She secretly replaces it with another DNA report indicating they are related. Ep 63: 从亲子检验报告里,敏熙发现锡勋与江必东根本没有亲子关系。她偷偷调换一份他们有亲子关系的假报告。.

programme.title: 黄金口袋 Golden Pouch - EP 93
programme.desc: Ep 64:Xixun tells Xuehua's parents that Xuehua is his girlfriend which shocks them. Jiang Bidong overhears Minxi and Junxiang s' conversation that Junxiang is actually his son, Jiang Xinyu. Ep 64:锡勋告诉雪花父母亲雪花是他的女朋友，两人感到惊讶。江必东无意间听到敏熙与俊相对话中得知俊相竟然是他的儿子江信宇。.

programme.title: 幸福方程式 The Joymakers - EP 8
programme.desc: In 2013, a trip to build water supply systems in Sarawak's rural farming areas became a life-changing opportunity for four youngsters. Motivated to help these communities overcome their economic hardships, they set up Langit Collective, a social enterprise to help farmers here to sell their crops. 四名转换人生跑道的年轻人，2013年随非政府组织来到马来西亚砂拉越偏乡建设供水系统，同时也看见了偏乡以种植稻 米维生的农民，所面临的经济困境。于是他们共同创办了社会企业，要协助农民卖米，翻转偏乡山区的经济，增加农民的收入。.

programme.title: 皇后的品格 The Last Empress - EP 21
programme.desc: Ep 23: Enlan holds a book sharing session at the palace with the aim of exposing that Helu is not Vincent Lee. Li Yun appears. He announces that he is the real Vincent Lee and that he has witnessed how Empress Zhaoxian fell into the pond seven years ago. Ep 24: Shan'ni leads Li He into thinking that the late Empress's body might have been buried in Enlan's garden. Li He goes in search of the body. Li Yun leads the media to the garden where they see Li He digging furiously. The public suspect Ep 23: 恩兰为了揭发荷露不是文森李，故意在皇宫举办分享会。珊妮要李赫当场朗读小说中的一段文章。李赫发现情节竟然跟昭贤皇后去世的情形相似。李允现身，公开自己才是真正的文森李，还说他当年目睹昭贤皇后落水的一幕，要皇室交待昭贤皇后的死因。Ep 24: 李允的小说写着死者的遗体被调换，但后埋葬。李赫怀疑李允知道更多内情，于是派千优彬拿昭贤皇后的骨灰去化验。化验结果显示那不是人的骨灰。随后，珊妮引导李赫怀疑太后当年并把昭贤皇后埋在花园里。李赫到花园找尸体的举动被媒体拍摄下来。民众怀疑李赫跟昭贤皇后的死有关。.
